title: Spellbound
creator_credit: Alfred Hitchcock and David O. Selznick
brief_description: Ingrid Bergman plays Dr. Peterson, a detached and brilliant psychiatrist who falls helplessly in love with Dr. Edwards, played by Gregory Peck, only to find he is an amnesiac and imposter suspected of murdering the true Dr. Edwards.

constellations_other.name: Good vibrations
constellations_other.description: Since its invention, the humble theremin has been used in a number of different ways to evoke all sorts of strange sounds and moods.

description: Ingrid Bergman plays Dr. Peterson, a detached and brilliant psychiatrist who falls helplessly in love with Dr. Edwards, played by Gregory Peck, only to find he is an amnesiac and imposter suspected of murdering the true Dr. Edwards. She sets out to prove his innocence, becoming a fugitive herself. Through skilful detective work, she manages to access the dark and confused chambers of his mind finding the clues which help her unravel this perplexing mystery.
description_for_label: Ingrid Bergman plays Dr. Peterson, a detached and brilliant psychiatrist who falls helplessly in love with Dr. Edwards, played by Gregory Peck, only to find he is an amnesiac and imposter suspected of murdering the true Dr. Edwards. She sets out to prove his innocence, becoming a fugitive herself. Through skilful detective work, she manages to access the dark and confused chambers of his mind finding the clues which help her unravel this perplexing mystery.
